archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0783
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be automatically redirected to a landing page based on certain situations/events, so that I'm directed in what I should do and therefore have a great customer experience. E.g. SIM not activated = redirect to an activation page. Customer is roaming = redirect to roaming landing page. Customer runs out of data = redirect to an 'out of data, buy more page.

properties.value: Pages should be displayed without a need to log in. Then such a page could redirect to Selfcare for example to buy some add-ons. List of scnarios which shuld be supported to be provided by Vodafone, in which situations redirection should be done.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
